column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////In the end our bill was $26 for two salads
column3: two personal pizza's and the dessert was free.  That's typically what a lunch would cost us at cosi/panera etc  in the city. On top of that with the food and service being so great
column4: I'd have to say this place may trump my original Chicago pizza favorite Giordano's.
